version_description: Captions and subtitle support.
Bug fixes.

Every new release of our app will include bug fixes, internal changes, stability and reliability improvements other than customer facing changes.

Customer facing changes part of the current release:
- Copy changes for IFE unavailable.
- Localization updates.

Every new release of our app will include bug fixes, internal changes, stability and reliability improvements other than customer facing changes.

Customer facing changes part of the current release:
- Bug fix where app might crash on iOS 8 devices during view transitions.
- Bug fix where it could crash on iOS 7 during replay of video.
